title: Group portrait of two men, including smiling groom in center wearing dark bow tie and light colored carnation, with two women, including bride smiling wearing hat with mid length veil and lace edge, earrings, light colored short sleeve wedding dress, floral lace yoke, satin skirt with floral lace overlay on left, and sheer elbow length fingerless gloves, holding bible with ribbons and flowers, standing in front of two toned background with striped background on either side in Harris Studio, possibly for Gibson Brown wedding
